inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//cluster cpu capacity by nanocore
KubeNodeInventory
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h)
| where split(_ResourceId, "/")[4] in ("', parameters('appGroups'), '") 
| distinct ClusterName, Computer
| join hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "cpuCapacityNanoCores"
| summarize LimitValue = max(CounterValue) by Computer, CounterName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| project Computer, LimitValue
) on Computer
| join kind=inner hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
| project Computer, UsageValue = CounterValue, TimeGenerated
) on Computer
| project ClusterName, Computer, TimeGenerated, UsagePercent = UsageValue * 100.0 / LimitValue
| summarize cpuUsage = avg(UsagePercent) by  ClusterName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m) 
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//kubernetes cluster memory usage across nodes
KubeNodeInventory
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" 
| distinct ClusterName, Computer
| join hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryCapacityBytes"
| summarize LimitValue = max(CounterValue) by Computer, CounterName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| project Computer, LimitValue
) on Computer
| join kind=inner hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"
| project Computer, UsageValue = CounterValue, TimeGenerated
) on Computer
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| project ClusterName, Computer, TimeGenerated, UsagePercent = UsageValue * 100.0 / LimitValue
| summarize averagePercentMemoryUsage = avg(UsagePercent) by ClusterName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart 
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//kubernetes disk capacity by cluster
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where Origin == "container.azm.ms/telegraf"
| where Namespace has "container.azm.ms/disk"
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '"
| extend ClusterName = tostring(parse_json(Tags).["container.azm.ms/clusterName"])
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, Device = tostring(Tags.device), Path = tostring(Tags.path), DiskMetricName = Name, DiskMetricValue = Val, ClusterName
| where DiskMetricName has "used_percent"
| summarize diskUsed = max(DiskMetricValue) by ClusterName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//container CPU usage by nanoCore
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" 
| extend InstanceName = strcat(ClusterId, "/", ContainerName), ContainerName = strcat(ControllerName, "/", tostring(split(ContainerName, "/")[1]))
| distinct Computer, InstanceName, ContainerName, ClusterName
| join hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SContainer"
| where CounterName == "cpuLimitNanoCores"
| summarize LimitValue = max(CounterValue) by Computer, InstanceName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| project Computer, InstanceName, LimitValue
) on Computer, InstanceName
| join kind=inner hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SContainer"
| where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
| project Computer, InstanceName, UsageValue = CounterValue, TimeGenerated
) on Computer, InstanceName
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| project Computer, ContainerName, TimeGenerated, UsagePercent = (UsageValue * 100.0 / LimitValue), LimitValue, ClusterName
| summarize averageUsedCPU = avg(UsagePercent) by ContainerName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//container memory usage
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" 
| extend InstanceName = strcat(ClusterId, "/", ContainerName), ContainerName = strcat(ControllerName, "/", tostring(split(ContainerName, "/")[1]))
| distinct Computer, InstanceName, ContainerName, ClusterName
| join hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SContainer"
| where CounterName == "memoryLimitBytes"
| summarize LimitValue = max(CounterValue) by Computer, InstanceName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| project Computer, InstanceName, LimitValue
) on Computer, InstanceName
| join kind=inner hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where ObjectName == "K8SContainer"
| where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"
| project Computer, InstanceName, UsageValue = CounterValue, TimeGenerated
) on Computer, InstanceName
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| project Computer, ContainerName, TimeGenerated, UsagePercent = (UsageValue * 100.0 / LimitValue), ClusterName
| summarize averageMemoryUsage = avg(UsagePercent) by ContainerName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m) 
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//kubernetes pod state counts
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" 
| distinct ClusterName, TimeGenerated
| summarize ClusterSnapshotCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), ClusterName
| join hint.strategy=broadcast (
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| distinct ClusterName, Computer, PodUid, TimeGenerated, PodStatus
| summarize TotalCount = count(),
PendingCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Pending"),
RunningCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Running"),
SucceededCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Succeeded"),
FailedCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Failed")
by ClusterName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
) on ClusterName, TimeGenerated
| extend UnknownCount = TotalCount - PendingCount - RunningCount - SucceededCount - FailedCount
| project ClusterName, TimeGenerated,
TotalCount = todouble(TotalCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
PendingCount = todouble(PendingCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
RunningCount = todouble(RunningCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
SucceededCount = todouble(SucceededCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
FailedCount = todouble(FailedCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
UnknownCount = todouble(UnknownCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount
| summarize by Pending=PendingCount, Failed=FailedCount, Unknown=UnknownCount, Succeeded=SucceededCount, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//dbformysql cpu consumed
AzureMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" and ResourceProvider has "dbformysql"
| where MetricName has "cpu"
| summarize averageUsedCPU=sum(Total) by Computer=Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//dbformysql memory consumed
AzureMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" and ResourceProvider has "dbformysql"
| where MetricName has "memory"
| summarize averageUsedMemory=avg(Total) by Computer=Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//dbformysql memory consumed
AzureMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" and ResourceProvider has "dbformysql"
| where MetricName has "storage_used"
| summarize averageUsedStorage=avg((((Total /1024)/1024)/1024)/1024) by Computer=Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//dbformysql average connections
AzureMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" and ResourceProvider has "dbformysql"
| where MetricName has "active"
| summarize averageConnections=avg(Total) by Computer=Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//dbformysql average failed connections
AzureMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" and ResourceProvider has "dbformysql"
| where MetricName has "failed"
| summarize averageFailedConnections=avg(Total) by Computer=Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//dbformysql average network egress
AzureMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h) 
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '" and ResourceProvider has "dbformysql"
| where MetricName has "egress"
| summarize averageNetworkEgress=avg(Total /1024) by Computer=Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//average vm cpu usage
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h)
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '"
| where Computer !contains "aks-" 
| where ObjectName has "processor"  and CounterName has "processor time" and InstanceName has "_total"
| summarize averageCPU=avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//average vm iops
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h)
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '"
| where Computer !contains "aks-"
| where ObjectName has "logical disk" or ObjectName has "logicaldisk" 
| where CounterName has "transfers/sec" and InstanceName has "_total"
| summarize averageIOPS=avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart   
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//average linux memory used
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h)
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '"
| where Computer !contains "aks-" and ObjectName has "memory"
| where CounterName has "used memory"
| summarize averageMemoryUsed=avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
[concat('//average linux memory used
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-24h)
| where _ResourceId contains "', parameters('applicationName'), '"
| where Computer !contains "aks-" and ObjectName has "memory"
| where CounterName has "mbytes"
| summarize averageAvailableGBytes=avg(CounterValue /1024) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart
')]
